description: The file is the main entry point for a Flutter application, defining the main widget structure including MaterialApp, a stateful homepage widget, and UI components such as AppBar, Text, and CircularProgressIndicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget of the Flutter application that sets up theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the home screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: The state class for MyHomePage, building the UI that includes app bar and progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the application that initializes and runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState that constructs the respective widget trees.
